description_html:
The Interlace Collection, made from mild steel, has a light feel yet boast of a very sturdy construction. This collection comprises everything from a seating set to full dining and bar options. It is offered in a variety of powder coated finishes. All the chairs come with Sunbrella covered pads.The series takes its name from interlacing strands of metal wires to form lightweight contemporary furniture that is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

Vincenzo Vinci, Stefano Campioni and Chai Xiaodong are the designers behind Interlace. They are among the founders of Collectivo, an international network of designers who combine their skills to offer design solutions to various sectors of the industry. Campioni and Vinci are Industrial Design graduates from Politecnico of Milan while Chai graduated from China’s Zheijang A&F University in Furniture and Interior Design.
